structure.unit: ARTICLE H. - RENTAL DWELLING REGISTRATION AND PROP NOTIFICATION

text.section: Any person taking title to a rental residential dwelling shall be the holder of the registration held by the prior owner for thirty (30) days after the transfer of title is recorded in the Wake County Registry or otherwise becomes legally binding. Upon the expiration of the thirty (30) day period a new registration shall be required.

The owner of a registered dwelling shall update annually the information previously provided, or sooner as required by the Director of the Inspections Department. (Ord. No. 2008-415B, ยง1, 7-1-08; Ord. No. 2011-980, ยง4, 11-15-11)
